title: KIM SWITCH / TRIED SHOOTING YOURSELF
description: a quick switch if you tried to shoot yourself with an empty gun

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The theatrical suicide attempt --..."
dialogueTree.text: "The theatrical suicide attempt -- we need to talk about it."

links.title: You: ""Yes. I want to talk about it as we..."
links.text: "Yes. I want to talk about it as well."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Well. I was able to re-contex..."
links.text: "Yes. Well. I was able to re-contextualize it as a dark joke." He pauses thoughtfully. "I will not be able to re-contextualize it the next time."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I understand you sometimes employ..."
links.text: "I understand you sometimes employ *extreme* interrogation tactics, but I want you to understand: that was *too* extreme."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't have RCM officers going a..."
links.text: "We can't have RCM officers going around, putting guns in their mouths. We can't afford to have that image. Few institutions can."

links.title: You: ""Understood. 100%. It won't happen..."
links.text: "Understood. 100%. It won't happen again."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. I'm glad we had this talk."..."
links.text: "Good. I'm glad we had this talk." He nods. "After you."

links.title: You: ""I went with my gut feeling and thi..."
links.text: "I went with my gut feeling and this time it was wrong."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Very, very, *very* wrong." He..."
links.text: "Yes. Very, very, *very* wrong." He nods in agreement. "I'm glad you see it my way. Let's go."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry I put you into this posi..."
links.text: "I'm sorry I put you into this position."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to apologize -- just keep..."
links.text: "No need to apologize -- just keep your gun out of your mouth and we'll be all right." He nods. "Let's move."

links.title: You: ""I wished to embrace The Gloaming a..."
links.text: "I wished to embrace The Gloaming ahead of time. The undoing of the atoms called to me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The Gloaming?" He takes off his gl..."
links.text: "The Gloaming?" He takes off his glasses and cleans them. "Now, that's exactly what we *can't* have. Couldn't have put it better myself. I would need to *re-contextualize* the hell out of that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He puts his glasses back on. "Now,..."
links.text: He puts his glasses back on. "Now, let's go. And let's keep guns out of our mouths. And not say anything about any gloaming, or anything like that."

links.title: You: ""It's going to happen again. I'm go..."
links.text: "It's going to happen again. I'm going to do it again. I'm going try it again *soon*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No." He takes off his glasses and..."
links.text: "No." He takes off his glasses and cleans them. "You're not. You're not going to put your gun into your mouth when we interrogate people. That is never going to happen again."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He puts his glasses back on and rep..."
links.text: He puts his glasses back on and repeats: "Never. Now, let's go."

links.title: Suggestion: "This was your chance to make amends..."
links.text: This was your chance to make amends, but you chose not to. Instead you chose to be the bad-ass suicide boiadeiro and now he doesn't like you.

links.title: You: ""But why did she leave me then?""
links.text: "But why did she leave me then?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Whooh..." He takes off his glasses..."
links.text: "Whooh..." He takes off his glasses, reaches for a cloth -- pauses -- and puts his glasses back on.

links.title: Suggestion: "He has an idea who *she* is. Many c..."
links.text: He has an idea who *she* is. Many cops have a *she* or *he* who left. But he just doesn't know what to say.

links.title: Rhetoric: "The right words just don't come to..."
links.text: The right words just don't come to him. He tries, but they don't.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know why she left you. Let..."
links.text: "I don't know why she left you. Let's go."

links.title: You: ""Do we have to?""
links.text: "Do we have to?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We do. I was able to re-contextual..."
links.text: "We do. I was able to re-contextualize it as a dark joke." He pauses thoughtfully. "I will not be able to re-contextualize it the next time."

links.title: You: ""It was a cry for help.""
links.text: "It was a cry for help."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Well. I was able to re-contex..."
links.text: "Yes. Well. I was able to re-contextualize it as a *dark joke*." He pauses thoughtfully. "I will not be able to re-contextualize it the next time."

links.title: You: ""No, we don't." [Leave.]"
links.text: "No, we don't." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, no. We are talking about it. I..."
links.text: "No, no. We are talking about it. I was able to re-contextualize it as a dark joke." He pauses thoughtfully. "I will not be able to re-contextualize it the next time."
